response.overview: In town for a job interview, a young woman arrives at her Airbnb late at night only to find that it has been mistakenly double-booked and a strange man is already staying there. Against her better judgement, she decides to stay the night anyway.
response.tagline: Some stay for a night. Some stay for a week. Some never leave.
response.title: Barbarian

results.name: Justin Long's New Movie | Official Trailer
